/*센터장려금요율 */ ,aa.clse_time /*주문마감시간 */ ,aa.deli_yoil /*배송 요일 */ ,aa.deli_date /*배송 특정일 */ ,aa.min_pur_amt /*최저발주금액 */ ,aa.haccp_yn /*HACCP인증여부 */ ,aa.supr_state /*휴/폐업상태 */ ,aa.clse_busi_date /*휴/폐업일자 */ ,aa.supr_id /*공급사 ID */ ,aa.supr_pwd /*공급사 패스워드 */ ,aa.sales_id /*매출처 ID */ ,aa.sales_pwd /*매출처 패스워드 */ ,aa.FILE_YN /*계약서 파일 사용여부 */ ,aa.cprogrm /*생성프로그램 */ ,aa.cuser /*생성자 */ ,CONVERT(CHAR(19), aa.cdate, 120) cdate /*생성일시 */ ,aa.mprogrm /*수정프로그램 */ ,aa.muser /*수정자 */ ,CONVERT(CHAR(19), aa.mdate, 120) mdate /*수정일시 */ FROM T_STD_MAST_CUSTMR aa left join COM_CMMN_CODE_DETAIL B1 on 'PAY_STD' = B1.CMMN_CD AND aa.PAY_STD = B1.CMMN_DETAIL_CD left join COM_CMMN_CODE_DETAIL B2 on 'PAY_DATE_TYPE' = B2.CMMN_CD AND aa.PAY_DATE_TYPE = B2.CMMN_DETAIL_CD left join COM_CMMN_CODE_DETAIL B3 on 'PUR_SALE_TYPE' = B3.CMMN_CD AND aa.PUR_SALE_TYPE = B3.CMMN_DETAIL_CD left join COM_CMMN_CODE_DETAIL B4 on 'PUR_TYPE' = B4.CMMN_CD AND aa.PUR_TYPE = B4.CMMN_DETAIL_CD left join COM_CMMN_CODE_DETAIL B5 on 'SUPR_GRUP_CD' = B5.CMMN_CD AND aa.SUPR_GRUP_CD = B5.CMMN_DETAIL_CD left join COM_CMMN_CODE_DETAIL B6 on 'SUPR_TYPE' = B6.CMMN_CD AND aa.SUPR_TYPE = B6.CMMN_DETAIL_CD /* left join T_STD_MAST_CREDITLOAN_DETL B7 on aa.CUSTMR_CD = B7.OBJ_CD */ /* left join T_STD_MAST_CREDITLOAN B8 on B7.LOAN_CD = B8.LOAN_CD */ left join COM_CMMN_CODE_DETAIL B9 on 'CUSTMR_GRUP' = B9.CMMN_CD AND aa.CUSTMR_GRUP = B9.CMMN_DETAIL_CD left join ( SELECT C1.OBJ_CD , C2.LOAN_CD, MAX(C2.LOAN_SEQ) LOAN_SEQ FROM T_STD_MAST_CREDITLOAN_DETL C1 left join T_STD_MAST_CREDITLOAN C2 on C1.LOAN_CD = C2.LOAN_CD GROUP BY C1.OBJ_CD, C2.LOAN_CD ) B7 ON aa.CUSTMR_CD = B7.OBJ_CD left join T_STD_MAST_CREDITLOAN B8 on B7.LOAN_CD = B8.LOAN_CD and B7.LOAN_SEQ = B8.LOAN_SEQ
INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM T_STD_CUSTMR_MK WHERE ORGN_DIV_CD = #{cmbORGN_DIV_CD} AND ORGN_CD = #{cmbORGN_CD}) MK on aa.CUSTMR_CD = MK.CUSTMR_CD
INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM T_STD_CUSTMR_MK WHERE ORGN_DIV_CD = #{cmbORGN_DIV_CD}) MK on aa.CUSTMR_CD = MK.CUSTMR_CD
INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM T_STD_CUSTMR_MK WHERE ORGN_CD = #{cmbORGN_CD}) MK on aa.CUSTMR_CD = MK.CUSTMR_CD
LEFT JOIN T_STD_CUSTMR_ACNT AS TA ON aa.CUSTMR_CD = TA.CUSTMR_CD WHERE aa.CUSTMR_CD IS NOT NULL AND ( aa.CUSTMR_CD LIKE #{Query_value} OR aa.CUSTMR_NM LIKE #{Query_value} OR aa.CUSTMR_CEONM LIKE #{Query_value} OR aa.CORP_NO LIKE #{Query_value} )
AND aa.PAY_STD = #{cmbPamentDay} /* 마감일자(결제기준) */
AND aa.PUR_SALE_TYPE = #{cmbPartnerIO} /* 거래처구분(매입-매출처구분) */
AND aa.CUSTMR_GRUP = #{cmbCUSTMR_GRUP} /* 거래처유형 */
AND aa.SUPR_GRUP_CD = #{cmbPartnerPART} /* 공급사분류코드 */
AND aa.SUPR_TYPE = #{cmbPartnerTYPE} /* 공급사유형 */
AND aa.USE_YN = #{cmbYNCD}
AND TA.USE_YN = #{cmbBANK_YN}
ORDER BY aa.custmr_cd
